医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
音乐疗法改善早产儿的睡眠和舒适度每日音乐干预显着改善早产儿的舒适度和睡眠过渡，而不影响生理稳定性。这项研究强调了非药物音乐疗法在新生儿护理中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Music-therapy-improves-sleep-and-comfort-in-preterm-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Music-therapy-improves-sleep-and-comfort-in-preterm-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1129ac6e-44b3-4b42-8bd6-0221df03e06d Tue, 24 Sep 2024 20:36:00 -0400 Music therapy improves sleep and comfort in preterm infants
有针对性的肥胖计划可降低儿童与脂质相关的心脏病风险研究人员评估肥胖儿童和青少年的血脂状况及其对健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Targeted-obesity-programs-reduce-lipid-lated-heart-disease-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Targeted-obesity-programs-reduce-lipid-lated-heart-disease-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abf12b74-42f0-48d6-b944-5bc69cc994e0 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Targeted obesity programs reduce lipid-related heart disease risk in children
研究发现决策障碍与帕金森病药物有关帕金森病 (PD)，也简称为帕金森病，是一种神经系统疾病，影响着全世界数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-uncovers-decision-making-impairments-linked-to-Parkinsons-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-uncovers-decision-making-impairments-linked-to-Parkinsons-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04bccc09-0349-44ad-a0d3-fe171860dac9 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 15:39:13 -0400 Study uncovers decision-making impairments linked to Parkinson's drug

研究显示美国监狱中阿片类药物治疗的机会有限对美国刑事司法系统成瘾治疗可用性的一项新调查显示，在全国接受调查的 1,028 所监狱中，只有不到一半 (43.8%) 提供任何形式的阿片类药物使用障碍药物，并且只有 12.8% 的监狱向患有阿片类药物使用障碍的任何人提供这些药物。紊乱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-limited-access-to-opioid-treatment-in-US-jails.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-reveals-limited-access-to-opioid-treatment-in-US-jails.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e60e1938-7f6e-4a89-96ce-df44220f893d Tue, 24 Sep 2024 15:22:14 -0400 Study reveals limited access to opioid treatment in US jails
关于大脑如何处理零概念的新见解尽管数字零对数学很重要，但人类大脑中数字零的神经元基础此前尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-insights-into-how-the-brain-processes-the-concept-of-zero.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-insights-into-how-the-brain-processes-the-concept-of-zero.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd27fd88-1075-4579-b2bf-69c92d3d87f0 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 15:15:05 -0400 New insights into how the brain processes the concept of zero

日本的尼泊尔妇女在获得性健康和生殖健康服务方面面临挑战尽管日本有大量尼泊尔社区，但由于尼泊尔和日本之间的语言障碍以及医疗保健法律和服务的差异，许多尼泊尔妇女在获得基本的性健康和生殖健康服务（SRHS）方面面临着重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Nepalese-women-in-Japan-face-challenges-in-accessing- Sex-and-reproductive-health-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Nepalese-women-in-Japan-face-challenges-in-accessing- Sex-and-reproductive-health-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a27d4840-96e1-40c9-a9ac-7232afe43c42 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 15:02:26 -0400 Nepalese women in Japan face challenges in accessing sexual and reproductive health services
了解用于增强免疫治疗的先天样 T 细胞我们的免疫系统跨越两个世界：先天的和适应性的。先天免疫细胞就像门口的军队，随时准备抵御入侵者并拉响身体警报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Understanding-innate-like-T-cells-for-enhanced-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Understanding-innate-like-T-cells-for-enhanced-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169315c5-8d4e-44bc-8c34-b497f5442a85 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 14:46:30 -0400 Understanding innate-like T cells for enhanced immunotherapy
